New Records: Coby White achieved a career-high nine three-pointers in the game.
Key Match Events: Zach LaVine and Coby White each scored 33 points.
Karl-Anthony Towns scored 44 points for the Knicks.
Jalen Brunson contributed 33 points for the Knicks.
Pre-Game Insights: The game was designated as 'Derrick Rose Night' by the Chicago Bulls.
The Bulls announced they would lift Derrick Rose's jersey into the rafters next season.
Post-Match Reflections: Coby White emphasized the importance of winning the game to honor Derrick Rose.
The Bulls' victory was seen as a statement win and an upset over the Knicks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Derrick Rose was honored at halftime of the game.
